maqras.text: 73|20|Niscaya tomara pratipalake jane ye, tumi chalatara babe thiya diya ketiyaba raatira praaya du'i-trtiyansata, ketiyaba ardhansata arau ketiyaba eka-trtiyansata arau tomara lagata thakasakalara eta dale'o thiya diye. Arau allahe'i nirdharana karae dina arau raatira paraimana. Te'om jane ye, tomaloke iyara sathika nirdharana palana karaiba noraaraiba, seye te'om tomalokaka ksama karaile. Eteke tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya simanakhini patha karaa. Te'om jane ye, tomalokara majara kichumana asustha hai paraiba, akau kichumane allahara anugraha sandhana karaibalai bhramana karaiba arau ana kichumane allahara pathata yud'dharata arasthata thakiba. Seye tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya se'ikhini patha karaa; arau tomaloke chalata pratistha karaa arau yakata pradana karaa lagate allahaka uttama rna pradana karaa. Tomalokara nijara mangalara babe tomaloke yi agatiyakai praerana karaiba seya allahara ocarata paba. I utkrstatama arau puraskara hicape bara mahat. Allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karai thaka; niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.
74|6|arau adhika poraara asata kako anugraha nakaraiba.
74|7|Arau tomara pratipalakara babe'i dhairya dharana karaa.
74|11|Yaka ma'i akalasaraiyakai srsti karaicho taka mora hatata erai diya.
74|12|Arau yaka ma'i pradana karaicho bipula dhana-sampada
74|14|Arau taka pradana karaicho sbacchanda jiranara pracura upakarana
74|15|tathapi'o si kamana karae ye, ma'i taka arau adhika di'om
74|17|Anatipalame ma'i taka (jahannamara picala silata) araohana karaibalai badhya karaama.
74|18|Niscaya si cinta karaile arau sid'dhanta grahana karaile.
74|19|Eteke si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
74|20|akau si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
74|22|Tara pichata si bhraum koca khoraale arau mukha bikrta karaile.
74|23|Tara pichata si ubhatile arau ahankara karaile.
74|24|Tara pichata si ka’le, ‘eya purbarae paraa cali aha yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya’
74|28|i eko arasista naraakhiba arau erai'o nidiba.
74|29|I sarairara chala jbala'i ka'la karai diba.

74|31|Arau ami kerala phiraistasakalake'i jahannamara tattbaradhayaka bana'icho; arau kaphirasakalara paraiksasbaraupa ami sihamtara sankhya nirdharana karaicho yate kitabapraaptasakale drrha bisbasa karae, arau muminasakalara imana brd'dhi paya arau yate kitabapraaptasakale arau muminasakale sandeha posana nakarae; arau yate iyara phalata yihamtara antarata byadhi ache sihamte arau kaphirasakale kaya, allahe e'i (sankhyara) udaharana di ki bujaba bicaraiche? Enekai allahe yaka iccha pathabhrasta karae arau yaka iccha take'i hidayata pradana karae; arau tomara pratipalakara sain'yabahini samparke te'omra bahirae ana konorae najane; arau jahannamara e'i udaharana manuhara babe eta upadesa matra.
74|37|Tomalokara majata yiye agrasara ha’ba bicarae athaba pichamuraa ha’ba bicarae tara babe.
74|44|‘arau ami dukhiyaka khadya dana karaa nachilo
74|45|arau ami anarthaka alocanakaraisakalara lagata behuda alaca karaata magna achilo.
74|48|Eteke chuparaichakaraisakalara chuparaiche sihamtara kono upakara nakaraiba.
74|49|Eteke sihamtara ki haiche, kiya sihamte upadesa banira paraa bimukha haiche
74|50|sihamte yena bhita-santrasta hai palayanarata banaraiya gadha.
74|52|Baram sihamtara majara pratyeka byaktiye'i kamana karae ye taka unmukta grantha pradana karaa ha'oka.
74|53|Ketiya'o nahaya, baram sihamte akhiraataka bhaya nakarae.
74|54|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'i kora'ana sakalorae babe upadesabani.
74|55|Eteke yara iccha si iyara paraa upadesa grahana karaka.
74|56|Arau allahara icchabihina konorae'i upadesa grahana karaiba noraarae teraemi bhayara yogya, kerala te'omrae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau teraemi ksama karaara adhikarai.
